data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 623 believers in the state of Béjaïa.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Béjaïa, Algeria
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Béjaïa, Algeria.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 1464 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Béjaïa, Algeria.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Béjaïa, Algeria know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Berber, Shawiya people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Béjaïa to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Béjaïa.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Béjaïa, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.
